allow: Bash(# Check Java content in complex processors \(x86, JVM, AARCH64, ARM, MIPS\) for p in x86 JVM AARCH64 ARM MIPS PowerPC RISCV; do echo ""=== $p ==="" find /Users/mquigley/dev/ghidra/Ghidra/Processors/$p/src/main/java -name ""*.java"")
Bash(# Count total lines across all .slaspec and .sinc files \(the actual spec size\) find /Users/mquigley/dev/ghidra/Ghidra/Processors/ -name ""*.slaspec"" -o -name ""*.sinc"" | xargs wc -l)
